data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Villarreal in their own half.
In the minute 2, Villarreal's Gerard Moreno is whistled for offside at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
David Medie Jimenez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 4, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Alaves drive forward but Deyverson is judged offside.
Throw-in for Alaves in the half of Villarreal.
In the minute 8, Throw-in Villarreal.
Villarreal's Vicente Iborra breaks free at Estadio de la Ceramica. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Villarreal.
In the minute 12, Throw-in high up the field for Villarreal in Villarreal.
Paco Alcacer scores to make it 1-0 at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Mario Gaspar instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 14, Can Alaves get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Villarreal's half?
David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Villarreal close to the penalty box.
Villarreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Alaves to take a throw-in in Villarreal territory.
In the minute 20, David Medie Jimenez signals a throw-in for Alaves, close to Villarreal's area.
Ball safe as Villarreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Villarreal at Estadio de la Ceramica.
In the minute 24, David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Alaves in their own half.
Villarreal are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Throw-in for Villarreal in their own half.
In the minute 25, Alaves are whistled for offside.
Villarreal pushes forward through Pervis Estupinan, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Alaves in their own half.
In the minute 26, Alaves awarded a throw-in in their own half.
David Medie Jimenez signals a Villarreal throw-in in Alaves's half.
In Villarreal, Villarreal push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 29, Villarreal have been awarded a corner by David Medie Jimenez.
Throw-in Alaves.
Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 33, David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Villarreal.
Throw-in for Villarreal in the half of Alaves.
Ball safe as Alaves is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Villarreal at Estadio de la Ceramica.
David Medie Jimenez awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal! Edgar Mendez levels the match at 1-1.
In the minute 39, David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Alaves in their own half.
Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alaves have a goal kick.
In the minute 41, David Medie Jimenez awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Villarreal at Estadio de la Ceramica.
David Medie Jimenez signals a Villarreal throw-in in Alaves's half.
In the minute 45, Villarreal have been awarded a penalty in Villarreal...
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Can Villarreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Alaves's half?
David Medie Jimenez blows to end the first-half.
It's advantage Villarreal in Villarreal as Gerard Moreno scores from the spot to make it 2-1.
In the minute 46, David Medie Jimenez has blown to start the second-half.
Lucas Perez for Alaves gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
David Medie Jimenez awards Villarreal a goal kick.
In the minute 46, Villarreal's Pervis Estupinan is on target but unsuccessful.
Villarreal's Paco Alcacer gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Alaves defender.
Villarreal to take a throw-in in Alaves territory.
In the minute 47, Villarreal have been awarded a corner by David Medie Jimenez.
Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
Free kick for Alaves in their own half.
In the minute 48, Ball safe as Alaves is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Villarreal a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
In the minute 50, Villarreal to take a throw-in in Alaves territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
Can Villarreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Alaves's half?
In the minute 53, Deyverson's header is off-target for Alaves.
Goal kick for Villarreal at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Villarreal have a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Alaves at Estadio de la Ceramica.
David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 57, David Medie Jimenez awards Villarreal a goal kick.
Free kick Villarreal.
Alaves's Edgar Mendez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 58, It's a goal kick for the home team in Villarreal.
Villarreal push upfield but David Medie Jimenez quickly pulls them for offside.
Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 62, Throw-in Alaves.
Throw-in for Villarreal in the half of Alaves.
David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Alaves in their own half.
In the minute 64, Villarreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Alaves in their own half.
Pablo Machin is making the team's first substitution at Estadio de la Ceramica with John Guidetti replacing Deyverson.
In the minute 66, The away team have replaced Borja Sainz with Luis Rioja. This is the second substitution made today by Pablo Machin.
Gerard Moreno (Villarreal) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
Goal! Paco Alcacer extends Villarreal's lead to 3-1.
In the minute 69, David Medie Jimenez awards the home team a throw-in.
Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Alaves is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 74, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Villarreal close to the penalty box.
Victor Laguardia (Alaves) has received a first yellow card.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Pervis Estupinan.
Villarreal are pushing forward but Dani Parejo's finish is wide of the goal.
David Medie Jimenez awards Alaves a goal kick.
In the minute 75, Pervis Estupinan is back on the pitch.
In the minute 75, Takefusa Kubo is replacing Manu Trigueros for Villarreal at Estadio de la Ceramica.
John Guidetti of Alaves gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 76, Goal kick for Villarreal at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Alaves make their third substitution with Sergi Garcia Perez replacing Edgar Mendez.
David Medie Jimenez waits before resuming play because Pervis Estupinan for Villarreal is still down.
Pervis Estupinan, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Jaume Costa is the substitute for Villarreal.
In the minute 78, Alaves drives forward and Lucas Perez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Alaves in their own half.
Villarreal have a goal kick.
In the minute 79, Alaves are coming forward and Pere Pons gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Villarreal.
Villarreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Alaves in the half of Villarreal.
Throw-in for Alaves in their own half.
Pablo Machin (Alaves) is making a fourth substitution, with Manu Garcia replacing Ruben Duarte.
In the minute 82, David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
Ximo Navarro (Alaves) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Rodrigo Ely is replacing Victor Laguardia for Alaves at Estadio de la Ceramica.
In the minute 83, Unai Emery is making the team's third substitution at Estadio de la Ceramica with Carlos Bacca replacing Gerard Moreno.
The home team have replaced Paco Alcacer with Ramiro Funes Mori. This is the fourth substitution made today by Unai Emery.
Samuel Chukwueze is on a sub for Moi Gomez for Villarreal.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Villarreal at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Throw-in Villarreal.
Throw-in for Alaves in their own half.
In the minute 87, Free kick Alaves.
Ball goes out of play for a Villarreal goal kick.
